channel.title: cs.SC updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: cs.SC updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Computing Euler products and coefficients of classical modular forms for twisted L-functions
item.description: arXiv:2507.06681v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We describe a complete algorithm to compute millions of coefficients of classical modular forms in a few seconds. We also review operations on Euler products and illustrate our methods with a computation of triple product L-function of large conductor.
item.dc:creator: Pascal Molin (IMJ-PRG)

item.title: Rational Solutions of Parametric First-Order Algebraic Differential Equations
item.description: arXiv:2307.05102v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this paper, we give an algorithm for finding general rational solutions of a given first-order ODE with parametric coefficients that occur rationally. We present an analysis, complete modulo Hilbert's irreducibility problem, of the existence of rational solutions of the differential equation, with parametric coefficients, when the parameters are specialized.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: Bulletin des Sciences Math\'ematiques, Volume 205, 2025, paper 103694
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Falkensteiner, Rafael Sendra
